Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not correctly handle the case when it is morning and it is not mom calling. According to the problem statement, in the morning, we should only answer if it is mom calling. But the buggy code returns true for this case. Generated Test cases 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 should pass the buggy code. Test case 6 was modified to make the buggy code fail.
